document.docAuthor: Niu, Ze-Qing, Yuan, Feng, Ascher, John S., Kasparek, Max, Orr, Michael C., Griswold, Terry & Zhu, Chao-Dong
document.masterDocTitle: Bees of the genus Anthidium Fabricius, 1804 (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Megachilidae: Anthidiini) from China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Bees of the genus Anthidium Fabricius, 1804 (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Megachilidae: Anthidiini) from China

subSubSection.paragraph: ( Fig. 1 a–h, female; Fig. 2 a–j, male)

1985: 140 (
Anthidium amurense Rad.
); Wu, 1993: 1396 (
Anthidium amurense Radoszkowski, 1876
).
Anthidium comatum Morawitz, 1896: 164
, ♀ , ♂ ; Proshchalykin, 2007: 6 ; synonymized by Proshchalykin (2013: 151) .
Anthidium ( Anthidium ) amurense Radoszkowski, 1876
: Wu, 2006: 144 , ♀ (key), 145, ♂ (key), 146, ♀ , ♂ (redescription), Fig.

Diagnosis: This species is very similar to
Anthidium ( A. ) montanum ( Morawitz, 1865 )
, but it can be distinguished from
A. ( A .) montanum
by the following combination of characters: female, apical margin of clypeus coarsely and sharply serrate, strongly rounded outward downward medially ( Fig. 1d ), punctures on supraclypeal area dense ( Fig. 1b ), T5–T6 covered with pale white pubescence ( Fig. 1h ); male, median lobe of S6 large, broad, and sub-rectangular ( Fig. 2e ), apical process of S8 broadly triangular ( Fig. 2h ).

Material examined:
China , Hebei : Xiaowitai Shan ( 39º54′N , 115º00′E ),
1200 m
, 3 ♀ , 2 ♂ ,
10.VIII. 1964
, 1450m, 2 ♀ ,
28. VI
.1964, leg. Yin-Heng HAN,
1400 m
, 1 ♀ , 1 ♂ ,
14.VII.1964
, 1 ♂ ,
28. VI
.1964, leg. Bing-Qian LI , 4 ♂ ,
12.VIII.1964
, leg. Jin-Long MAO
,
1200–1400 m
, 1 ♂ ,
22.VIII.1964
, 1 ♂ ,
23.VIII.1964
, leg. Chun-Guang WANG
;
China , Inner Mongolia : Daqing Shan ( 41º50′N , 116º47′E ),
1716 m
, 3 ♂ (on flower of
Medicago sativa
),
14.VIII.2018
, leg. Qiang-Tao WU
and Jing-Ting CHEN
.
Distribution: Eastern Palaearctic. China ( Hebei , Inner Mongolia *); Russia (Eastern Siberia, Far East).

Remarks: Wu (2006) misidentified the specimens from “ China , Xinjiang : Zhaosu Xian, Alasan ( 42º31′N , 80º48′E ), 2400 m , 1 ♀ , 23.VII.1978 , leg. Yin-Heng HANG, 1 ♂ , 22.VII.1978 , leg. Xue-Zhong ZHANG” as this species and recorded the species occurring in Xinjiang , but study of these specimens finds they are
Anthidium ( Anthidium ) montanum ( Morawitz, 1865 )
. At present, the species is only confirmed from China from Hebei and Inner Mongolia , not from Xinjiang in western China .
